I recently visited P.C.Chandra Jewellers Asansol branch and was absolutely amazed by the service I received. From the moment I walked in, the staff made me feel welcome and valued as a customer. All the staff members were very friendly and helpful. Unlike some jewellery stores that can feel intimidating, the atmosphere here was warm and inviting.
The sales associate named Debanjana assisted me took the time to understand exactly what I was looking for and showed remarkable patience as I browsed through various options. And the other sales associate Urmila‚Äôs knowledge about the pieces and everything was impressive - offering insights about the materials, craftsmanship, and design elements that helped me make an informed decision.
What truly stood out was their no-pressure approach. I never felt rushed or pushed toward a more expensive option. Instead, they seemed genuinely interested in helping me find the perfect piece that matched both my taste and budget.
The store itself was beautifully organised with elegant displays that made it easy to view their collection. Everything was immaculately clean, and the lighting was perfect for examining the jewellery's details. I highly recommend to anyone looking for quality jewellery and exceptional customer service and authenticity. I'll definitely be returning for future purchases!

I have a little experience of exchanging old gold ornaments for new ones. I have found that P.C. Chandra Jewellers gives a fair deal on gold exchange. I have exchanged non-hallmarked 91.6% pure gold in this showroom and received the complete exchange value for gold. There was no deduction in the weight of gold or the cost per gram of gold during the aforementioned exchange. Some of the other big gold brands in the city were not willing to offer such a deal. I have also exchanged 75% and 78% pure gold which correspond to 18K and a little above 18K purity, from this showroom. There was a deduction, perhaps slightly on the higher side, in the weight of gold as there should be since the calculation is based on the price of 91.6% pure gold. If one takes into account the price of 18K gold on the day, it was again a fair deal. In the first instance, the old ornaments were cut into smaller pieces to ascertain the purity of gold possibly by using a Karat meter while in the second case, the visibly less pure gold ornaments were first melted and solidified and then the purity of gold was checked. The process is quite transparent. I felt that the designs of gold ornaments were exquisite. The making charge of gold ornaments was 18% of the value of gold. The salespersons were courteous, I am quite happy with my experience in this showroom.

I  visited the shop  today and was assisted by Manash Baanagerji. The service was excellent from start to finish. He was professional, knowledgeable, and very patient in helping me choose the right item.

What impressed me most was how the shop handled an exchange. I needed to return and exchange an item I had purchased, and the staff, including Manash, were very understanding and cooperative. They managed the situation calmly and respectfully, without any frustration or hesitation, which made me feel truly valued as a customer.

This level of customer service is rare and deeply appreciated. I highly recommend this shop to anyone looking to buy gold/ Diamonds  with confidence.

P.C. Chandra Jewellers is a well-known jewelry company in India that was founded in 1939 by Shri. Purna Chandra Chandra:

History: The company started with its first showroom in Bowbazaar, North Kolkata. Today, it has a presence across India and abroad.

Known for: P.C. Chandra Jewellers is known for its timeless craftsmanship, contemporary designs, and exceptional product quality.

Philosophy: The company's philosophy is "A jewel of jewels".

Online store: The company has an online store where you can send orders.

I‚Äôm extremely grateful to the sales executive called Priyanka for her outstanding support and assistance. Her kindness, patience, and understanding truly touched me. Exceptional service with a human touch‚Äîthank you so much, Priyanka!

P. C. Chandra stands out from all others because of it's huge variety of jewellery in unique designs, within different price ranges. It breaks the false idea that it is meant only for the HIG.
Like other outlets, this branch also makes its presence felt with its grandeur and the store is also well organised.
After knowing the requirements of the customers, they are navigated to the appropriate counter by the welcoming receptionist. With patience and smile, the sales personnel at the respective counters try their best to display items to suit the parameters and demands of the customers.
The store is extremely well managed even during the  Dhanteras Rush.
15 yrs back I had been to this outlet and this year, I revisited and my purchase experience was even better.
I wanted a light weight gold bracelet in meenakari work and I had 5-7 options to choose from. Payment procedure was also smooth.
Hospitality was also top notch. Waiters were all over with trays of coffee and water.
Overall, P. C. Chandra is the ultimate destination for it offers more than Gold. It gifts memories to cherish and assets to appreciate.

It is a renowned Jewellery store of P C Chandra group. It is located at Bank of India crossing near Sealdah Station. Various types of Gold and Silver Jewellery of high and moderate prices are available here. Paid parking is available near the store.

Sales persons are very helpful and knowledgeable about their items.
